meanings.definition: A person who performs laparoscopic surgery.
meanings.sent1: The skilled laparoscopists carefully operated on the patient's abdomen.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired new laparoscopists to assist with minimally invasive surgeries.
meanings.sent3: The laparoscopists joked that they could perform surgery blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The team of laparoscopists were like precision artists, painting inside the body with their tools.
meanings.sent5: The laparoscopists' expertise made the surgery seem like a delicate dance.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who specialize in laparoscopic procedures.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated laparoscopists worked together seamlessly in the operating room.
meanings.sent2: The conference was attended by many renowned laparoscopists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The laparoscopists organized a fun team-building event for their staff.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the laparoscopists was as strong as the bond between siblings.
meanings.sent5: The hospital's success was attributed to the exceptional skills of the laparoscopists.
